name: spimw
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, wff w0, wff w1

stmt.origin: ax-mp(wi(wal(s0, w0), w1), wn(wal(s0, wn(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))))))

body.origin:
|- wi(wal(s0, w0), w1)
-| wn(wal(s0, wn(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))
-| wi(wn(wal(s0, wn(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))))), wi(wal(s0, w0), w1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wal(s0, w0), w1)
-| wn(wal(s0, wn(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))
-| wi(wn(wal(s0, wn(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))))), wi(wal(s0, w0), w1))

|- wi(wal(s0, w0), w1)
-| wi(wn(wal(s0, wn(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))))), wi(wal(s0, w0), w1))
-| diffss(s0, s1)

body.origin:
|- wi(wn(wal(s0, wn(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))))), wi(wal(s0, w0), w1))
-| wi(wn(w1), wal(s0, wn(w1)))
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wi(w0, w1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wal(s0, w0), w1)
-| diffss(s0, s1)
-| wi(wn(w1), wal(s0, wn(w1)))
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wi(w0, w1))

comment: Specialization. Lemma 8 of [KalishMontague] p. 87. Uses only Tarski's FOL axiom schemes. (Contributed by NM, 19-Apr-2017.) (Proof shortened by Wolf Lammen, 7-Aug-2017.)
